text: anayinum pennayinum nayavancakarkal anaivarum ore inattavare! Avarkal (anaivarume) pavamana kariyankalaic ceyyumpatit tuntuvarkal; nanmaiyana kariyankalait tatai ceyvarkal. (Celavu ceyya avaciyamana camayankalil) tankal kaikalai mutikkolvarkal. Avarkal allahvai marantu vittarkal; atalal, allahvum avarkalai marantu vittan. Niccayamaka innayavancakarkal tan (cati ceyyum) kotiya pavikal
